**2024/2025**

• **Safety**

Zero Lost Time Injuries

• **Customer Complaints**

< 2 Work Order complaints per month

• **Scrap Rate**

**< 5%** average per month

• **Product Recall/Withdrawal**

No “Product Recall/Withdrawal” due to

non-compliance of legislative requirements

* **Sustainability**

Introduction of Pouches utilising Recyclable Material. Reduce / Reuse / Recycle

• **BRC**

Maintain AA Certification
